::Bazooka::

    "Thank you for a task." Bazooka said to Megatron. "Beast Mode" He 
transformed into beast mode and waddled down the hall following Scorponok.
    Soon he came across Quickstrike, and the bot that made him(Bazooka) a 
Predacon, Shredder. They were all banging on a door. "Megatron's orders are 
to retrive Quickstrike. He appears to be in a mad persuit, I know the 
feeling, but I must continue with my task." Bazooka thinks to himself. He 
walks up to the door and slams it with his club tail. It only dents barely. 
Bazooka gets really mad that his primary beast mode weapon doesn't work and a 
little of his animal nature comes out. He developed a new task and nothing 
will stop him, not even autoguns...
